item.description:
Last year I organized this event several times... A HUGE success! Really a lot of fun! This band is awesome! Reggae , island style.. "Kelley B is a sexy chick playing a mean horn, keyboards & sing'in! " (taken from their website) ONCE YOU HEAR THIS BAND YOU ARE HOOKED!
The view from the deck is just fantastic... the music, the drinks, the food and the view! You can't ask for more!
www.michaelsharborside.com
www.hotlikefire.net

TIME: I plan on being there before 3pm.

COST: if you get there early, there isn't a cover charge.
if not, I believe it is $5.00

Interested?


*NOTE: After being @ Michael's Harborside we will be heading over to THE GROG!
for PARKER WHEELER'S BLUES PARTY!
_Jo
item.how_to_find_us: We will all get together up on the TIKI DECK. I will do my best to get there by 2:00. Look for the meetup table sign.
item.why: HOT LIKE FIRE! is an awesome band! The view from the Tiki Deck overlooks boats passing by as they make their way to the ocean... very beautiful!
item.name: HOT LIKE FIRE! @ Michael's Harborside
